entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:18 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tofino Airport 06:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: 8.9°C
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 8.5°C
Wind: SE 32 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 50 to 70 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections this morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming southeast 30 near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
